line_1: No hour she blindly to the rest prefers,
line_2: No idol titled name her rev'rence stirs,

line_1: He lost in errors his vain heart prefers,
line_2: She safe in the simplicity of hers.

line_1: Whom your high merit, and their own, prefers
line_2: To all the worthiest beds of England's peers.

line_1: Course tastless Thornback to the Sole prefers.
line_2: Who Myra loves, when Clytie appears,

line_1: Her Form to lovely Venus he prefers,
line_2: Or swears that Venus must be such as hers.

line_1: The wanton Muse the meaner Thorn prefers
line_2: To Coral Twigs, and Amber's costly Tears;

line_1: The World rejects, yet stupidly prefers,
